entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
